<MethodEndpoint

</MethodEndpoint>



ログイン中のユーザーの注文履歴を取得します。


<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"page","in":"query","description":"ページ番号（1から始まる）","required":false,"schema":{"type":"integer","minimum":1,"default":1},"example":1},{"name":"pageSize","in":"query","description":"1ページあたりのアイテム数","required":false,"schema":{"type":"integer","minimum":1,"maximum":100,"default":20},"example":20},{"name":"status","in":"query","description":"注文ステータスでフィルタ","required":false,"schema":{"type":"string","enum":["PENDING","CONFIRMED","PROCESSING","SHIPPED","DELIVERED","CANCELLED","RETURNED"]},"example":"DELIVERED"},{"name":"fromDate","in":"query","description":"開始日（この日以降の注文）","required":false,"schema":{"type":"string","format":"date"},"example":"2025-01-01"},{"name":"toDate","in":"query","description":"終了日（この日以前の注文）","required":false,"schema":{"type":"string","format":"date"},"example":"2025-12-31"}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
